TextEquiv.Unicode: QUESTÃO 40 - DISCURSIVA Mr. John Smith, your direct supervisor at the Home-Sweet-Hotel, asks you, his Executive Secretary, to answer the letter below. He suggests that you refer to the appropriate sections from the guests' information booklet, which is in every room on the hotel bedside table. He emphasizes that the Home-Sweet-Hotel's policy should be explained clearly but tactfully. “We want our customers back and don't want to annoy Mr. Foster any further”, he adds. (valor: 10,0 pontos)
